subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Burton arrives at Lowe’s Motor Speedway for Saturday night’s Bank of America 500 as the points leader, but is hardly in command with just a 6-point edge.
snippet: Jeff Burton arrives at Lowe’s Motor Speedway for Saturday night’s Bank of America 500 as the points leader, but is hardly in command with just a 6-point edge.
